title: Thomas Frank on Anti-Populism, Plus Biden's Most-Stoned Moment Ever
description:
Author Thomas Frank joins the show to discuss his latest book ‘The People, NO: A Brief History of Anti-Populism.’ Katie and Matt dissect Biden's most-stoned moment ever.
